permissions: Allowed for admin users or users who are time sheet approvers for the time sheet (time_sheet.is_user_time_sheet_approver?(user)).
side_effects: Creates a time sheet approval and transitions the time sheet status to approved; may trigger notifications to time card approvers after commit when all plan time sheets are approved.
validation_notes: --time-sheet is required and must identify an existing time sheet. Time sheet status must be editing or submitted. Time sheet must have a duration. If the time sheet is for a crew requirement and cost code allocation is required by the job production plan or customer, a time sheet cost code allocation must be present.

flags.name: --time-sheet
flags.validation: Required; must be a non-empty time sheet ID.
